info.title: USA.Gov Corporate Consumer Contact Information API
info.description: We make the Corporate Consumer Contact listing found in the Consumer Action Handbook (PDF) available via a REST API. The API programmatically returns all of the information contained in the directory, or you can query the API to return just a subset of the available information.

get.description: Contacts is a general purpose call that, by default, will return all of the corporate directory records. However, you can pass parameters into the contacts call that allow you to filter the records returned by the API in powerful ways.

parameters.name: query_filter
parameters.description: Return only corporate directory records that meet the criteria you enter into this parameter. In general, the filter takes the form of {field_name}::{value}[|{field_name}::{value}]*. Additionally, for names, you can perform substring searches by surrounding {value} with asterisks.

parameters.name: result_filter
parameters.description: Return only the fields listed here (separated by |) as opposed to every field in each directory record. For example, use a result_filter of name|phone to return only names and phone numbers.  See the data model above for a list of field names that you can specify be returned.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Allows you to specify the sort order of the returned agency directory records. For example, use a sort of name to sort the results by the agency???s name. You can also cause the sort to go in descending order by adding a - before the field name, such as -name.

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: You can limit the results returned by the API by including an X-Range HTTP header in your GET request, with a value of items=x to y, where x is the lower limit and y is the upper limit of the results to be returned.

get.description: The Contact call will let you access an individual corporation's information by including its unique identifier in the call.

Id.description: A unique identifier for each directory record

Description.description: Any notes about contacting the corporation.

Subdivision.description: Used for mailing letters to the corporation..

Street1.description: A first line of address information (such as the street address) for contacting the corporation.

Street2.description: A second line of address information for contacting the corporation.

City.description: The city of the corporation's mailing address.

StateTer.description: The state of the corporation's mailing address.

Zip.description: The postal zip code of the corporation's mailing address.

Email.description: The e-mail address for contacting the corporation.

Phone.description: The phone number to be used when contacting the corporation (may contain more than one).

TTY.description: The TTY number to be used when contacting the corporation (may contain more than one).

Tollfree.description: The toll-free number to be used when contacting the corporation (may contain more than one).

URI.description: The URL to access the corporation???s complete directory record via the API.
